enterprise_only_label.message: 仅在 Firefox ESR 生效

explanation_about_policies.message: 所有活跃的策略和错误都会在 about:policies 页面对应的“policies.json”文件中显示一个摘要。

explanation_intro.message: 点击下方的按钮会生成一段代码。该代码需要保存在一个名为 “policies.json” 的文件里，放在 distribution 目录。

explanation_intro_linux.message: 在 Firefox 安装目录中创建一个名为 “distribution” 的文件夹，并将 “policies.json” 文件放到该文件夹。

explanation_intro_macos.message: Create a “distribution” directory inside the /Contents/Resources/ directory of the Firefox application package and place the file “policies.json” there. To open the application package, right-click on the Firefox application in the Finder and choose “show package contents” from the context menu.

explanation_intro_windows.message: 在 firefox.exe 文件所在的目录创建一个名为 “distribution” 的文件夹，并将 “policies.json” 文件放到该文件夹。

extension_description.message: 为 Firefox 生成企业策略。

policy_description_3rdParty.message: Preconfiguration of settings for extensions that use chrome.storage.managed

policy_description_3rdparty_JSON_label.message: JSON (configuration must be surrounded by curly brackets {})

policy_description_AllowedDomainsForApps.message: Define domains allowed to access Google Workspace

policy_description_AppUpdateURL.message: 用于 Firefox 更新的不同服务器 URL

policy_description_Authentication.message: 支持整合验证 (integrated authentication) 的站点

policy_description_Authentication_AllowN.message: 始终允许在非 FQDN（完全限定性域名）上使用 SPNEGO 或 NTLM
始终允许在非 FQDN 上使用 NTLM
始终允许在非 FQDN 上使用 SPNEGO

policy_description_Authentication_AllowP.message: Always allow SPNEGO or NTLM with proxy servers
Always allow NTLM with proxy servers
Always allow NTLM with proxy servers

policy_description_Authentication_Privat.message: Enable integrated authentication in private browsing

policy_description_AutoLaunchProtocolsFr.message: Define a list of external protocols that can be used from listed origins without prompting the user

policy_description_BlockAboutAddons.message: 阻止访问附加组件管理器 (about:addons)

policy_description_BlockAboutConfig.message: 阻止访问浏览器配置页面 (about:config)

policy_description_BlockAboutProfiles.message: 阻止访问内嵌的配置文件管理器 (about:profiles)

policy_description_BlockAboutSupport.message: 阻止访问故障排除信息页面 (about:support)

policy_description_CaptivePortal.message: 开启或关闭强制门户认证（captive portal）支持

policy_description_CaptivePortal_options.message: 关闭强制门户认证支持
开启强制门户认证支持

policy_description_Certificates_ImportEn.message: 读取系统证书库中的证书（仅限 Windows 和 macOS）
不读取系统证书库中的证书
读取系统证书库中的证书

policy_description_Certificates_Install.message: 导入证书（Windows：%USERNAME\AppData\Local\Mozilla\Certificates 或 %USERNAME\AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Certificates，macOS：/Library/Application Support/Mozilla/Certificates 或 ~/Library/Application Support/Mozilla/Certificates，Linux：/usr/lib/mozilla/certificates, /usr/lib64/mozilla/certificates 或 ~/.mozilla/certificates）

policy_description_Cookies.message: 允许或阻止网站设置 Cookie

policy_description_Cookies_AcceptThirdPa.message: “接受第三方 Cookie 和网站数据”的默认值

policy_description_Cookies_Allow.message: 始终允许设置 Cookie 的域名

policy_description_Cookies_AllowSession.message: Domains where cookies are only allowed for the current session

policy_description_Cookies_Block.message: 始终阻止设置 Cookies 的域名

policy_description_Cookies_Default.message: “接受来自网站的 Cookie 和网站数据”的默认值

policy_description_DefaultDownloadDirect.message: 对于原生的主目录可使用 ${home}

policy_description_DisableAppUpdate.message: 阻止 Firefox 进行更新

policy_description_DisabledCiphers.message: Enable or disable specific cryptographic ciphers

policy_description_DisableDeveloperTools.message: 禁用内置的开发者工具

policy_description_DisableFeedbackComman.message: 禁用“帮助”菜单中的“提交反馈”和“举报诈骗网站”菜单

policy_description_DisableFirefoxAccount.message: Disable Mozilla account based services like Firefox Sync

policy_description_DisableFirefoxScreens.message: 禁用内置的截图工具（Firefox Screenshots）

policy_description_DisableFirefoxStudies.message: 阻止 Firefox 安装并运行一些实验项目和上下文特性推荐 (contextual feature recommendations)

policy_description_DisableForgetButton.message: 禁用“抹去足迹”工具栏按钮，阻止用它清除最近的浏览历史

policy_description_DisableFormHistory.message: 禁用表单和搜索栏历史

policy_description_DisablePasswordReveal.message: Do not allow passwords to be revealed in saved logins

policy_description_DisablePocket.message: 禁用 Mozilla 提供的 Pocket 服务

policy_description_DisableProfileImport.message: 禁用“我的足迹”里的“从其他浏览器导入数据”菜单

policy_description_DisableProfileRefresh.message: 禁用 about:support 页面中的“翻新 Firefox” 按钮

policy_description_DisableSafeMode.message: 禁用以安全模式重启浏览器菜单项

policy_description_DisableSecurityBypass.message: 阻止跳过特定的安全警告
阻止将已显示为无效的证书添加到例外列表
阻止安全警告被跳过导致用户访问恶意网站

policy_description_DisableSetDesktopBack.message: 禁用将图像设为桌面背景的功能

policy_description_DisableSystemAddonUpd.message: 阻止 Firefox 安装和更新系统附加组件

policy_description_DisableTelemetry.message: 阻止 Firefox 发送技术信息和交互数据到 Mozilla （遥测）

policy_description_DisplayMenuBar_always.message: The menubar is always shown and cannot be hidden

policy_description_DisplayMenuBar_defaul.message: The menubar is off by default but can be shown
The menubar is on by default but can be hidden

policy_description_DisplayMenuBar_never.message: The menubar is hidden and cannot be shown

policy_description_DNSOverHTTPS_Excluded.message: Exclude domains from DNS over HTTPS

policy_description_DontCheckDefaultBrows.message: 配置启动时是否检查为默认浏览器
启动时检查 Firefox 是否为默认浏览器
启动时不检查 Firefox 是否为默认浏览器

policy_description_DownloadDirectory_Lab.message: 对于原生的主目录可使用 ${home}

policy_description_EnableTrackingProtect.message: 拦截加密货币挖矿程序
拦截数字指纹跟踪程序

policy_description_EncryptedMediaExtensi.message: Enable or disable Encrypted Media Extensions (needed for video streaming portals)
If disabled, Firefox will not download the Widevine CDM unless the user consents to installing it. If disabled and locked the user will not be asked to download Widevine.

policy_description_Extensions.message: 安装、卸载或锁定特定扩展

policy_description_Extensions_Deprecated.message: 已不使用，请使用下面的策略。

policy_description_Extensions_Install.message: 在这里设定安装附加组件。您可以指定 URL 或路径。

policy_description_Extensions_Locked.message: 被锁定的扩展不能被禁用或卸载。请指定扩展的 ID。

policy_description_Extensions_Uninstall.message: 在这里设定卸载附加组件。请指定扩展的 ID。

policy_description_ExtensionSettings.message: 管理附加组件的安装和卸载

policy_description_ExtensionSettings_blo.message: 用户尝试安装被阻止的附加组件时显示的错误消息
用户尝试安装被阻止的附加组件时显示的错误消息

policy_description_ExtensionSettings_ext.message: 针对单独附加组件的配置
针对所有附加组件的配置

policy_description_ExtensionSettings_ins.message: 所允许的安装来源。必须允许 *.xpi 文件的路径和开始下载的页面这两个来源。 Match patterns allowed, see info link.
安装 URL。如果是从本地文件系统安装，请使用 file:/// 形式的 URI。
已允许用户发起的附加组件安装
已允许用户发起的该附加组件的安装
不允许用户发起的附加组件安装，已安装的附加组件将从设备移除
不允许用户发起的附加组件安装，已安装的附加组件将从设备移除
该附加组件已被自动安装，用户无法移除（需有安装 url）
该附加组件已被自动安装，用户无法禁用（需有安装 url）

policy_description_ExtensionSettings_res.message: Domains on which content scripts can't be run

policy_description_ExtensionUpdate.message: 允许或阻止扩展自动更新

policy_description_Handlers_property_ask.message: Ask the user what they want to do with the file
The action is taken without user intervention
The user is asked what they want to do with the file

policy_description_Handlers_property_han.message: A list of handlers, where the first handler is the default handler. If there is to be no standard handler, an empty object is to be used for the first handler. Either the path to a local application or the URL to a web-based handler can be specified.
The display name of the handler (might not be used)
URL to a web-based handler. Must start with https:// and contain "%s" for the substitution

policy_description_Homepage_StartPage_Ho.message: … 设置为主页的网站 (but the user can also optionally start with the previous browser session)
… 设置为主页的网站 (the user cannot start with the previous browser session)

policy_description_LegacySameSiteCookieB.message: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting
Enable the legacy behavior for SameSite cookies on specified websites

policy_description_LocalFileLinks.message: 允许指定网站链接到本地文件

policy_description_ManagedBookmarks.message: Managed bookmarks (cannot be changed or removed by the user)

policy_description_NetworkPrediction.message: 启用或禁用网络预测 (DNS 预读取)

policy_description_NetworkPrediction_opt.message: 禁用网络预测 (DNS 预读取)
启用网络预测 (DNS 预读取)

policy_description_NewTabPage.message: 启用或禁用打开新标签页时显示的页面

policy_description_NoDefaultBookmarks.message: 不创建默认的书签集，包括智能书签（最常访问、最近的标签）。注意：该策略仅在配置文件首次启用时生效

policy_description_OfferToSaveLogins.message: Allow Firefox to offer to remember logins and passwords (cannot be overwritten)

policy_description_OfferToSaveLoginsDefa.message: Allow Firefox to offer to remember logins and passwords (can be overwritten by the user)

policy_description_OverrideFirstRunPage.message: 允许覆盖首次运行时显示的页面。如果您想禁止显示，请将 URL 栏留空。

policy_description_OverridePostUpdatePag.message: 覆盖浏览器更新后显示的“新功能”（What's New）页面。如果您想禁止显示该页面，请将 URL 栏留空。

policy_description_PasswordManagerEnable.message: 完全启用或禁用密码管理器

policy_description_PDFjs.message: Disable or configure the built-in PDF viewer

policy_description_PDFjs_Enabled.message: Enable or disable the built-in PDF viewer

policy_description_PDFjs_EnablePermissio.message: Honor document permissions like preventing the copying of text

policy_description_Permissions_Camera_Al.message: 允许下列 URL 操控

policy_description_Permissions_Camera_Bl.message: 阻止下列 URL 操控
禁止请求操控您的摄像头

policy_description_Permissions_Location_.message: 允许下列 URL 获知
阻止下列 URL 获知
禁止请求获知您的位置

policy_description_Permissions_Microphon.message: 允许下列 URL 操控
阻止下列 URL 操控
禁止请求操控您的麦克风

policy_description_Permissions_Notificat.message: 允许下列 URL 传送通知
阻止下列 URL 传送通知
禁止请求向您传送通知

policy_description_Permissions_VirtualRe.message: 允许下列 URL 操控
阻止下列 URL 操控
Block new requests asking to access your virtual reality devices

policy_description_PictureInPicture.message: Enable or disable the picture in picture feature for videos

policy_description_PopupBlocking.message: 允许或阻止显示弹出窗口

policy_description_PopupBlocking_Allow.message: 允许显示弹出窗口的域名

policy_description_Preference_browser_ca.message: 启用或禁用硬盘存储缓存

policy_description_Preference_browser_fi.message: 先发送地址栏的单个字词到 DNS，而非直接发送到搜索引擎

policy_description_Preference_browser_ta.message: 浏览器关闭时显示警告

policy_description_Preference_browser_ur.message: 使用地址栏时建议书签
使用地址栏时建议浏览历史
使用地址栏时建议打开的标签页

policy_description_Preference_datareport.message: 初次运行时显示隐私策略标签页

policy_description_Preference_dom_disabl.message: 允许网站随意更改窗口焦点
允许网站移动窗口和更改窗口尺寸

policy_description_Preference_dom_event_.message: 允许网站覆盖上下文菜单

policy_description_Preference_dom_keyboa.message: 网页标准：对于特定域名恢复按键（keypress）事件和非可打印（non-printable）按键的原有行为
网页标准：对于特定域名恢复 keyCode 和 charCode 的原有行为

policy_description_Preference_extensions.message: 显示附加组件管理器的推荐版块

policy_description_Preference_media_gmp_.message: 下载 OpenH264 插件以便进行 WebRTC 通信

policy_description_Preference_network_dn.message: 执行 IPv6 DNS 查找

policy_description_Preference_network_ID.message: 显示国际化域名的 punycode 版本

policy_description_Preference_privacy_fi.message: 允许本地文件访问其他本地文件（有安全风险！）

policy_description_Preference_security_d.message: 提示用户选择默认的个人证书

policy_description_Preference_security_s.message: 允许发送 TLS 错误到 Mozilla

policy_description_Preference_ui_key_men.message: 可按 Alt 键显示菜单栏

policy_description_Preferences_Status_cl.message: Preference will be reset to default at every start, value has no effect

policy_description_Preferences_Status_de.message: Preference can be changed and appears as default in case of non-default value

policy_description_Preferences_Status_lo.message: Preference can not be changed and appears as default in case of non-default value

policy_description_Preferences_Status_us.message: Preference can be changed and appears as modified in case of non-default value

policy_description_PrimaryPassword.message: Require or prevent using a primary password (formerly known as  master password)

policy_description_PromptForDownloadLoca.message: 每次文件下载前询问保存位置

policy_description_Proxy.message: 配置连接互联网的代理服务器

policy_description_Proxy_HTTPProxy.message: HTTP 代理。要配置端口号，请在端口号前添加 “:”

policy_description_Proxy_Mode_autoDetect.message: 自动检测此网络的代理设置

policy_description_Proxy_FTPProxy.message: FTP 代理。要配置端口号，请在端口号前添加 “:”

policy_description_Proxy_SOCKSProxy.message: SOCKS 主机。要配置端口号，请在端口号前添加 “:”

policy_description_Proxy_SSLProxy.message: SSL 代理。要配置端口号，请在端口号前添加 “:”

policy_description_Proxy_UseHTTPProxyFor.message: 所有协议都不使用此代理服务器
所有协议都使用此代理服务器

policy_description_Proxy_UseProxyForDNS.message: 使用 SOCKS v5 时代理 DNS 查询

policy_description_RequestedLocales.message: 修改 Firefox 的界面语言

policy_description_RequestedLocales_Requ.message: 必须安装对应的语言包。留空则使用操作系统当前的语言。

policy_description_SanitizeOnShutdown.message: 关闭浏览器时清除浏览器数据

policy_description_SanitizeOnShutdown_Lo.message: Protect only the set options from changes

policy_description_SearchBar.message: 搜索栏合并或分开显示

policy_description_SearchEngines.message: 修改 Firefox 内置的搜索引擎列表

policy_description_SearchEngines_Add_Ali.message: 调用搜索引擎的别名（关键字）

policy_description_SearchEngines_Add_Pos.message: POST 数据 (如果选择使用 POST method，例如 q={searchTerms}&anotherParam=yes)

policy_description_SearchEngines_Add_Sug.message: 搜索建议的 URL。使用 {searchTerms} 作为搜索关键词的占位符

policy_description_SearchEngines_Add_URL.message: 搜索的 URL。使用 {searchTerms} 作为搜索关键词的占位符

policy_description_ShowHomeButton.message: Show the home button on the toolbar

policy_description_SSLVersionMax.message: 最高支持的 TLS 版本

policy_description_SSLVersionMin.message: 最低要求的 TLS 版本

policy_description_SupportMenu.message: 在帮助菜单添加一个自定义的支持菜单项

policy_description_UserMessaging.message: Allow or prevent Firefox from messaging the user

policy_description_UserMessaging_Extensi.message: Recommend extensions while the user is visiting websites

policy_description_UserMessaging_SkipOnb.message: Disable onboarding screen for new users

policy_description_UserMessaging_UrlbarI.message: Show Firefox specific suggestions in the URL bar

policy_description_UserMessaging_WhatsNe.message: Show the “What's New“ icon and menu item

policy_description_WebsiteFilter.message: 阻止访问特定网站。您可以使用 “<all_urls>” 屏蔽所有 URL。点击更多信息链接可以查看所有有效项，仅支持 HTTPS 和 HTTP 的 URL。

requirement_windows_or_linux.message: 仅适用于 Windows 和 Linux
